tier_1_5.name: Goo Ball
tier_1_5.description: A small, gelatinous blob of pure mana. They are the simplest of magical life forms, often found near mana-rich Ley Lines. They are naturally docile and only attack when threatened.

behavior.social: Solitary, but will merge to form a King Goo when threatened.
behavior.tactics: Bounces around the battlefield and splits when hit. It's a simple, unpredictable foe.
behavior.notes: Vulnerable to most physical damage but can regenerate. They have no strong elemental ties.

abilities.name: Bounce
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.effect: The first time the Goo Ball is hit, it splits into two smaller Goo Balls, each with half the current Vitality.

tier_1_5.name: Eyepicker
tier_1_5.description: A scavenger bird with a razor-sharp beak and a piercing caw. They often nest in rocky outcroppings and are known for their unnerving ability to pick out the eyes of their fallen prey.

behavior.tactics: Works with its flock to surround and overwhelm enemies. They rely on their numbers and speed to win.
behavior.notes: Avoids one-on-one fights and flees when its allies are defeated.

abilities.name: Peck
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Flock Tactics (Passive)
abilities.effect: Gains a +1 bonus to attack for each other Eyepicker adjacent to its target.

abilities.name: Distracting Caw
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Eyepicker can caw loudly at a target, giving the next attack against that target a +1 bonus.

tier_1_5.name: Nut Trooper
tier_1_5.description: A sentient plant that resembles a humanoid with a large, armored seed for a head. They are often found in forests, defending their territory with crude spears and hardened shells.

behavior.tactics: Fights on the front lines, using its shell to resist damage.

abilities.name: Spear Jab
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 physical damage.

abilities.name: Shell Defense (Reaction)
abilities.effect: As a reaction when attacked, the Nut Trooper can withdraw into its shell, increasing its Damage Reduction to 3 for that single attack.

tier_1_5.name: Bandit
tier_1_5.description: A common thug or cutthroat, often found in the wilds or the back alleys of major cities. They rely on numbers and dirty tricks to get what they want.

behavior.tactics: Tries to get a numerical advantage and use minor debuffs to gain an edge.
behavior.notes: Will flee when outnumbered or severely wounded.

abilities.name: Crude Sword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Pocket Sand
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Bandit can throw sand at a target's eyes. The target has a -2 penalty on their next attack roll.

tier_1_5.name: Sporeling
tier_1_5.description: A walking fungus that releases clouds of spores to disorient its enemies. They are a passive creature that only attacks in self-defense.

behavior.tactics: Uses its spores to protect itself and then roots itself to escape.
behavior.notes: Is immune to being moved once it uses its root ability.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Confusing Spores (Reaction)
abilities.effect: When hit by a melee attack, the attacker must make a Spirit DC 12 check or have a -1 penalty to their next roll.

abilities.name: Root
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Sporeling can root itself to the ground, becoming immune to being moved until its next turn.

tier_1_5.name: Cinder Pup
tier_1_5.description: A small, fire-infused canine from the slopes of Mount Dragnor. They are playful, but their touch is hot enough to burn flesh.

behavior.tactics: Charges in to inflict fire damage, then retreats to a safe distance.
behavior.notes: They are immune to fire damage and can be found alongside other fire elementals.

abilities.name: Hot-headed (Passive)
abilities.effect: A creature that hits the Cinder Pup with a melee attack takes 1d4 fire damage.

abilities.name: Ember Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 fire damage.

abilities.name: Smoke Puff
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, creates a 5-foot cube of smoke, lightly obscuring the area for 1 round.

tier_1_5.name: Hobgoblin
tier_1_5.description: A highly organized and disciplined soldier of the goblinoid races. Hobgoblins are fiercely loyal to their commanders and fight with military precision. They are a sign that a major goblinoid force is nearby.

behavior.tactics: Commands its allies from the front lines, focusing on tactical strikes and defensive maneuvers.
behavior.notes: Often found with other goblins, including archers and shamans.

abilities.name: Longsword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8+4 physical damage.

abilities.name: Commander's Orders
abilities.effect: As a bonus action, the Hobgoblin can grant an allied Goblin a free 5-foot movement.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.effect: As a bonus action after attacking, can attempt to shove a target 5 feet.

tier_1_5.name: Thorn Creeper
tier_1_5.description: An aggressive, carnivorous plant that uses thorny vines to ensnare its prey. They lie in wait, camouflaging themselves in dense foliage before attacking.

behavior.tactics: Relies on its camouflage to get the drop on enemies. It uses its vines to restrain and damage a single target, letting it bleed out.

abilities.name: Thorn Lash
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.effect: On a successful hit, the target must make an Agility DC 13 check or become 'Restrained'.

abilities.name: Camouflage
abilities.effect: If the Thorn Creeper has not moved this turn, attacks against it have a -1 penalty.

tier_1_5.name: Gloomfang Wolf
tier_1_5.description: A vicious, pack-hunting wolf from the shadowed forests. They are known for their venomous fangs and their mournful howls that can chill a hero to the bone.

behavior.tactics: Focuses on poisoning and harassing targets before moving in for the kill.
behavior.notes: Their howl can rally other wolves in the area.

abilities.name: Vicious Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Venomous Fangs
abilities.effect: On a successful hit, the target must make a Might DC 12 check or become 'Poisoned' for 1 minute.

abilities.name: Pack Howl
abilities.effect: As a major action, grants all allied wolves within 30 feet a +1 bonus to their next attack roll.

tier_1_5.name: Scalebound Skirmisher
tier_1_5.description: A lizard-like warrior from the Scalebound Clans. They are master hunters and skirmishers, using their speed and agility to get the drop on their enemies.

behavior.tactics: Attacks from a distance, using its high agility to avoid close-range combat.
behavior.notes: Will use its dagger as a last resort when enemies get too close.

abilities.name: Shortbow
abilities.effect: Ranged attack dealing 1d6 physical damage.

abilities.name: Skirmish (Passive)
abilities.effect: After making a ranged attack, the Skirmisher can immediately move up to 10 feet without provoking an Attack of Opportunity.

abilities.name: Quick Stab (Reaction)
abilities.effect: If an enemy moves within 5 feet of the Skirmisher, it can use its reaction to make a single dagger attack (1d4 damage).

tier_1_5.name: Red Goo
tier_1_5.description: A volatile ooze that radiates a faint heat. It's surprisingly aggressive.

abilities.name: Singe
abilities.effect: Deals 1d6 fire damage.

tier_1_5.name: Mage Goo
tier_1_5.description: A rare ooze shimmering with arcane energy. It has rudimentary magical abilities.

abilities.name: Spark
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 lightning damage.

tier_1_5.name: Poison Goo
tier_1_5.description: A sickly green ooze that leaks a foul-smelling toxin.

abilities.name: Venom Spit
abilities.effect: Deals 1d4 physical damage and may poison the target.

tier_1_5.name: Bandit Thug
tier_1_5.description: A common highway robber looking for an easy score.

abilities.name: Crude Sword
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage.

tier_6_10.name: Banshee
tier_6_10.description: The sorrowful spirit of a woman whose shriek can drain the will to live.

abilities.name: Wail of Despair
abilities.effect: All enemies in an area must make a Spirit check or suffer severe penalties.

tier_6_10.name: Basilisk
tier_6_10.description: A reptilian beast whose gaze can turn living flesh to stone.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.effect: A character who fails a Spirit check may be turned to stone.

tier_6_10.name: Crystal Entity
tier_6_10.description: A being of living crystal animated by the power of the Crystal Spire. It reflects magical energy.

abilities.name: Spell Reflection
abilities.effect: Has a chance to reflect single-target spells back at the caster.

tier_6_10.name: Dominion Sorcerer
tier_6_10.description: An accomplished mage of the Arcane Dominion, wielding powerful and destructive elemental spells.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 lightning damage that can jump to other targets.

tier_6_10.name: Iron Golem
tier_6_10.description: An upgraded golem forged from iron, nearly impervious to conventional weapons.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.effect: Deals 3d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.effect: Has advantage on checks to resist spells.

tier_6_10.name: Mimic
tier_6_10.description: A cunning predator that disguises itself as a treasure chest, lashing out at greedy adventurers.

abilities.name: Surprise Attack
abilities.effect: Deals high damage on the first round of combat.

tier_6_10.name: Minotaur
tier_6_10.description: A bull-headed humanoid of immense strength, often found in labyrinths.

abilities.name: Greataxe
abilities.effect: Deals 2d10 physical damage.

tier_6_10.name: Nightmare
tier_6_10.description: A terrifying horse-like creature with a mane of shadow and hooves of burning embers.

abilities.name: Burning Hooves
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical and 1d8 fire damage on a charge.

tier_6_10.name: Ogre
tier_6_10.description: A large, brutish giant that is dim-witted but incredibly strong.

abilities.name: Greatclub
abilities.effect: Deals 2d10 physical damage.

tier_6_10.name: Order Knight
tier_6_10.description: A disciplined warrior of the Champions of Order, clad in steel plate armor.

abilities.name: Greatsword
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.effect: Can attempt to daze a target.

tier_6_10.name: Saberclaw Tiger
tier_6_10.description: A prehistoric tiger with immense fangs, a patient and deadly predator.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.effect: Can leap a great distance to attack with advantage.

tier_6_10.name: Sand Worm
tier_6_10.description: A colossal worm that burrows beneath the desert sands, emerging to swallow its prey whole.

abilities.name: Swallow
abilities.effect: Attempts to engulf a target, dealing heavy damage each round.

abilities.name: Tunnel
abilities.effect: Burrows underground and emerges elsewhere.

tier_6_10.name: Spectre
tier_6_10.description: A powerful, hateful ghost that can possess the living.

abilities.name: Possession
abilities.effect: Attempts to take control of a character for one round.

tier_6_10.name: Troll
tier_6_10.description: A fearsome giant known for its incredible ability to regenerate from wounds.
tier_6_10.gm_note: CR is conditional. Without access to fire or acid to stop Regeneration, this encounter is closer to CR 8 or 9.

abilities.name: Rending Claws
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 physical damage.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heals a portion of its vitality each round unless struck by fire or acid.

tier_6_10.name: Wyndian Royal Guard
tier_6_10.description: An elite winged soldier from Wyndia, skilled with both sword and wind magic.

abilities.name: Gale Slash
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage and can knock a target back.

tier_6_10.name: Wyvern
tier_6_10.description: A lesser relative of dragons, with two legs and winged arms. It possesses a venomous stinger on its tail.

abilities.name: Claw/Bite
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Poison Stinger
abilities.effect: Deals 1d8 physical damage and inflicts potent poison.

tier_11_20.name: Cinder-Scale Tyrant
tier_11_20.description: A massive, four-legged drake whose scales are made of cooling magma and obsidian. It guards the inner sanctum of the temple on Mount Dragnor, treating it as its personal lair. It is a creature of pure rage and fire.

abilities.name: Magma Maw
abilities.effect: Deals 3d10 fire damage in a 30-ft cone. A successful Agility DC 13 check halves the damage.

abilities.name: Tail Swipe
abilities.effect: Deals 2d8 physical damage to all characters in melee range.

abilities.name: Eruption
abilities.effect: Causes a fissure to open under a target's feet, dealing 2d10 fire damage and immobilizing them for 1 round on a failed Agility DC 14 check.

abilities.name: Obsidian Scales
abilities.effect: Immune to fire damage; resistant to physical damage.

tier_11_20.name: Elder Treant
tier_11_20.description: An ancient, walking tree of immense size and wisdom, a guardian of the forest.

abilities.name: Colossal Slam
abilities.effect: Deals 3d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Animate Trees
abilities.effect: Summons lesser plant monsters.

tier_11_20.name: Hydra
tier_11_20.description: A multi-headed serpent. For each head that is severed, two more may grow in its place.

abilities.name: Multi-Headed Bite
abilities.effect: Attacks multiple times per round.

abilities.name: Regenerate Head
abilities.effect: If a head is destroyed, it can regrow more unless the wound is cauterized with fire.

tier_11_20.name: Kraken Spawn
tier_11_20.description: A juvenile kraken, though still massive and deadly, with powerful tentacles.

abilities.name: Tentacle Slam
abilities.effect: Can attack multiple targets with its tentacles.

abilities.name: Ink Cloud
abilities.effect: Creates an area of magical darkness in the water.

tier_11_20.name: Lich
tier_11_20.description: A powerful wizard who has achieved a form of immortality through undeath. Commands legions of lesser undead.

abilities.name: Frost Lance
abilities.effect: Deals 2d10 cold damage and slows the target.

abilities.name: Animate Dead
abilities.effect: Summons 1d4 Skeleton Warriors.

abilities.name: Multi-Attack
abilities.effect: Makes three attacks (one bite, two claws).

abilities.name: Divine Breath
abilities.effect: Breathes a 90-foot line of holy fire, dealing 12d10 light damage.

abilities.name: Lance of Light
abilities.effect: Deals 3d10 light damage.

abilities.name: Divine Judgment
abilities.effect: Deals 5d10 light damage and prevents target from using special abilities.

abilities.name: Flight (Passive)
abilities.effect: The Archon has a permanent fly speed of 60 feet.

abilities.name: Hellfire Greatsword
abilities.effect: Deals 4d12 fire damage.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.effect: As a major action, creates a 30-foot radius of fire that burns for 3 rounds.

abilities.name: Holy Claw
abilities.effect: Deals 3d10 light damage.

abilities.name: Sun-Bathed Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heals 20 Vitality per turn while in bright light.

abilities.name: Swallow Whole
abilities.effect: On a successful grapple, the target is swallowed, taking 5d10 acid damage per turn.

abilities.name: Tunnel
abilities.effect: As a major action, the Dread Worm can burrow underground and re-emerge anywhere on the battlefield on its next turn.

tier_21_plus.name: Elysia, the Silent Goddess
tier_21_plus.description: The final antagonist, a being of pure, conceptual energy who seeks to 'correct' the heroes by erasing their free will.

abilities.name: Decree: Inertia
abilities.effect: All creatures within 100 feet must make a Might DC 30 check or their movement speed becomes 0.

abilities.name: Decree: Silence
abilities.effect: All creatures within 100 feet must make a Spirit DC 30 check or they cannot cast spells or use abilities.

abilities.name: Decree: Entropy
abilities.effect: A single target must make a Spirit DC 30 check or be erased from existence.

abilities.name: Perfect Order (Passive)
abilities.effect: Elysia cannot be surprised or flanked. Any dice rolled against her have their result automatically set to the average (e.g., a d10 becomes a 5).

abilities.name: Goo Crush
abilities.effect: Deals 3d12 bludgeoning damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.effect: Deals 4d10 arcane damage.

abilities.name: Summon Horde
abilities.effect: Summons 2d4 random Goo monsters.

tier_21_plus.name: The Dragon Lord
tier_21_plus.description: The resurrected and empowered spirit of the greatest of the ancient dragon kings.

abilities.name: Primal Breath
abilities.effect: Deals 20d12 damage of a random elemental type.

abilities.name: Dragon's Decree
abilities.effect: Can cast any Archon-level Aspect Ability as a major action.

abilities.name: King's Aura (Passive)
abilities.effect: Allies have advantage on all rolls.

tier_21_plus.name: The Firstborn of the Void
tier_21_plus.description: A colossal entity of mouths, eyes, and tentacles that guards the very heart of the Void Chasm.

abilities.name: Gaze of Madness
abilities.effect: Forces a Spirit DC 22 check or become permanently Confused.

abilities.name: Tendril Swarm
abilities.effect: Makes 6 attacks, each dealing 3d10 physical damage.

abilities.name: Unravel Reality
abilities.effect: Can erase a 30-foot cube of the battlefield.

tier_21_plus.name: The Twin Wardens of the Pinnacle
tier_21_plus.description: Two colossal golems guarding Elysia's domain. One absorbs physical, the other magical damage.

tier_21_plus.name: The Unfettered, Awakened Zael
tier_21_plus.description: Zael, having fully succumbed to the Void and achieved a dark apotheosis.

abilities.name: Whispers of Despair
abilities.effect: Forces all characters to make a Spirit DC 25 check or lose their turn.

abilities.name: Oblivion's Gaze
abilities.effect: A target takes 10d10 necrotic damage and their maximum Vitality is permanently reduced.

abilities.name: Summon Horror
abilities.effect: Summons a Void Behemoth.

abilities.name: Colossal Boulder
abilities.effect: Ranged attack dealing 6d12 physical damage.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.effect: As a major action, stuns all enemies in a 60-foot radius on a failed Might DC 20 check.

abilities.name: Chaotic Strike
abilities.effect: Deals 4d12 damage of a random elemental type.

abilities.name: Legacy Drain
abilities.effect: On a hit, the target loses 1 Legacy Point.

bosses.name: Blightoad
bosses.description: A horrifically bloated toad-fiend, roughly the size of a small cart. Its slick, warty hide pulses with a sickly green light, and foul-smelling pustules weep a constant, black bile. Awakened from a long slumber by the surge of Rya's draconic power, it now sees all living things as a meal.

abilities.name: Blight Slam
abilities.effect: Deals 1d10 physical damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Bile Spit
abilities.effect: Ranged attack (30 ft). On a hit, the target takes 1d6 acid damage and must make a Might DC 12 check or become 'Poisoned'.

abilities.name: Barbed Lash
abilities.effect: The Blightoad lashes out with its tongue at a target up to 15 ft away. The target takes 1d8 physical damage and must make a Might DC 13 check or be pulled 10 feet closer to the Blightoad.

abilities.name: Pustulent Hide (Passive)
abilities.effect: A creature that hits the Blightoad with a melee attack takes 1d4 acid damage as a corrosive pustule bursts on impact.

bosses.name: The Gloomwood Heart
bosses.description: An ancient treant that was once the guardian of the woods, now twisted by a creeping blight. Its wooden body is covered in pulsating fungi and weeping sap, and its movements are unnaturally violent. It is the source of the corruption spreading through the Whispering Woods.

abilities.name: Crushing Branch
abilities.effect: Deals 2d10 physical damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Blight Spores
abilities.effect: Area-of-effect attack that deals 1d10 poison damage per round to all party members for 3 rounds. A successful Mind (Survival) check can negate the effect for an individual.

abilities.name: Summon Saplings
abilities.effect: Summons 1d4 Nut Troopers or Gloomcaps to join the fight.

bosses.name: Grand Inquisitor Valerius
bosses.description: A relentless and high-ranking member of the Champions of Order. Clad in blessed silver armor, he views draconic power not as a tool, but as a chaotic sin that must be purged from the world. He is a skilled tactician and duelist who has been personally tasked with capturing Rya.

abilities.name: Consecrated Blade
abilities.effect: Deals 2d10 physical damage. Deals an additional 1d10 damage to beings with 'chaotic' or 'draconic' lineage.

abilities.name: Elysian Judgment
abilities.effect: A beam of light strikes a target, dealing 2d10 light damage and preventing them from using any special abilities on their next turn on a failed Spirit DC 14 check.

abilities.name: Shield of Order
abilities.effect: Gains +4 to resist any magical or draconic ability for 1 round.

bosses.name: Grove Warden
bosses.description: Once a serene, ancient guardian of the wood, this colossal treant has been driven to madness. Its bark is blackened and cracked, weeping a foul, dark sap. Thorny, unnatural vines writhe across its body, and its roar is a sound of pure, unending anguish. It now attacks any living thing that enters its grove with mindless fury.

abilities.name: Crushing Branch
abilities.effect: Melee attack dealing 2d12 physical damage.

abilities.name: Grasping Roots
abilities.effect: As a major action, the Warden causes roots to erupt in a 20-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make an Agility DC 15 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round.

abilities.name: Warden's Wail
abilities.effect: The Warden lets out a sorrowful roar, forcing all enemies within 30 feet to make a Spirit DC 14 check. On a failure, they are struck by its psychic pain and suffer a -2 penalty on all attack rolls for 2 rounds. This ability cannot be used while Rampaging Fury is active.

abilities.name: Ironbark Skin (Passive)
abilities.effect: The Warden has resistance to physical damage from non-magical sources. It is vulnerable to fire damage.

abilities.name: Rampaging Fury (Trigger)
abilities.effect: When the Grove Warden is reduced to 45 Vitality or less, the corruption fully takes hold. Its Damage Reduction increases to 8, and its Crushing Branch attacks are now made with Advantage. However, it can no longer use its Warden's Wail ability.

bosses.name: Runeforge Guardian
bosses.description: A bipedal construct of obsidian and brass, standing eight feet tall. Glowing runes pulse across its chassis, and its head is a single, unblinking crystalline lens. A relic of the pre-Shattering era, it is an unwavering sentinel that adapts its power to match any threat. It activates only to eliminate intruders with lethal efficiency.

formulas.attack_damage: For every 4 PPL above 7, add one additional damage die to its Siege Fist and Arcane Bolt attacks.
formulas.ability_dc: The DC for Containment Protocol is 14 + floor((PPL - 7) / 2).
formulas.overload_threshold: The Vitality threshold for its Overload Sequence is 25% of its current maximum Vitality.

base_abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
base_abilities.effect: Ranged attack (Range 120 ft) dealing 2d8 arcane damage.

base_abilities.name: Containment Protocol
base_abilities.effect: The Guardian fires a beam at one target. The target must succeed on an Agility check (see scaling DC) or become 'Restrained' inside a cage of solid light for 2 rounds. The Guardian can only have one target contained at a time.

base_abilities.name: Runic Plating (Passive)
base_abilities.effect: The Guardian is resistant to all physical damage from non-magical sources and has resistance to lightning damage.

base_abilities.name: Overload Sequence (Trigger)
base_abilities.effect: When the Guardian is reduced to its Overload Threshold, its runes flare violently. At the start of each of its turns, it deals arcane damage equal to its Mind attribute to all creatures within 10 feet. While in this state, its Damage Reduction is reduced to 0.
